law.catch_line: Promulgation Of Rules And Regulations Necessary To Carry Out Provisions Of This Chapter
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 224, Sec. 216 effective November 4, 2012.] The commissioner shall promulgate rules and regulations as are necessary to carry out the provisions of this chapter. In developing the rules and regulations, including risk-bearing standards, certification and reporting requirements, the commissioner shall consider other rules and regulations applicable to such organizations and shall consult with the center and the commission regarding standards concerning provider organizations which enter into alternative payment contracts.
